schema.description: Gets all of the sale infos for a given token address.
schema.title: Sale infos for address

limit.ui:title: Limit
limit.ui:description: Limit the number of sale infos to retrieve. Enter a positive integer up to 30, or leave it empty for a default value of 10.

start_after.ui:title: Start After
start_after.ui:description: Retrieve sale infos starting after a specific token ID. Leave it empty to start from the beginning.

token_address.ui:title: Token Address
token_address.ui:description: The address of the token for which you want to retrieve sale infos.
